0.text: Innate: Mordekaiser's basic attacks deal 40% AP bonus magic damage  on-hit.

1.text: Damaging basic attacks and basic abilities grant Mordekaiser a stack for 4 seconds for every enemy  champion or  monster hit, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Mordekaiser gains Darkness Rise. Subsequent damaging attacks and basic abilities against enemy champions and monsters refresh the duration.

2.text: Darkness Rise: Mordekaiser deals「 5 − 15.2 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) (+ 1% − 5% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage per second 」「 0.63 − 1.9 (based on level) (+ 3.75% AP) (+ 0.13% − 0.63% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.125 seconds 」to all nearby enemies and gains  3% bonus movement speed. The damage per second against monsters is capped at 180.

0.text: Active: Mordekaiser smashes the area in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  increased if it hits only one enemy.

Passive: Mordekaiser stores 35% of the post-mitigation damage he deals and 15% of the pre-mitigation damage he takes,「 reduced by 75% for non-champion sources 」「 reduced to 8.75% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources 」, as Potential Shield on his secondary resource bar, up to  30% of his maximum health. The Potential Shield decays by 8 − 25 (based on level) every second after not dealing or taking damage for 1 second, down to a minimum of 5% of his maximum health.

1.text: Active: Mordekaiser consumes all his current Potential Shield to  shield himself for 4 seconds for the same amount. The shield initially decays very slowly but exponentially increases near the end. Indestructible can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the shield is active.

2.text: Recast: Mordekaiser consumes the remaining shield,  healing for a percentage of the amount.

1.text: Active: Mordekaiser summons a claw in the target direction that grants  sight of the area and, after 0.5 seconds, deals magic damage to all enemies within and  pulls them 250 units.

0.text: Active: Mordekaiser  slows the target enemy  champion by 75% during the cast time, after which they're  banished together with Mordekaiser to the Death Realm for 7 seconds.

1.text: Units between realms see each other as spirits, considering each other dead and negating any interactions between the two. Only the target and Mordekaiser will enter the realm; other champions cannot follow them. Everything that occurs inside the Death Realm is hidden, and all  pets still inside are killed at the end.

2.text: Additionally, for the same duration, Mordekaiser consumes the target's soul, reducing their current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,   maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. If the target dies while inside, Mordekaiser keeps their partial stats until they respawn.

3.text: If one of the two affected champions leave the Death Realm, because of having died or having it dispelled, the other will do so as well, but the stats will remain stolen for the full duration.
